history.proof: unfold lim. unfold app_chain. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type D : cpo s : chain [cpoofA -> D] x : A Unable to unify "CPO.mx_lim (CPO.mixin (CPO.class D))" with "CPO.mx_lim (CPO.mixin (CPO.class [cpoofA -> D])) s".

original: unfold lim. unfold app_chain. apply f_equal. apply functional_extensionality. intro c. apply (limM _ _ (s c)). intros x H. apply H.
